Detailed Description

This class implements background loading of particle systems.

Constructor for MPSBackgroundTask.

Member Function Documentation

void MPSBackgroundTask::doBackgroundTask ( BgTaskManager &  mgr  )  [virtual]

This method is called in the background thread by the task manager.

It creates and loads the C++ particle system class, but does not consruct the python wrapper.

Parameters:
mgr The background task manager instance

Implements BackgroundTask.

void MPSBackgroundTask::doMainThreadTask ( BgTaskManager &  mgr  )  [virtual]

This method is called in the main thread by the task manager.

It creates the python wrapper class and calls the callback function with it as the first argument.

Parameters:
mgr The background task manager instance

Reimplemented from BackgroundTask.
